text:
@GregAbbott_TX April 27th we had our lowest number of new Covid19 cases 535 @GregAbbott_TX
  starting May1st will open parts of the state. 1,438 new cases reported.  Active Cases jumps from 13,674 on the 27th. To 16,537 May 1st..  18k by Friday.
